subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James knocked down an 18-foot jumper with 10.5 seconds left to lift the Heat over the Celtics and extend Miami’s winning streak, which is 10 shy of the N.B.A. record.
snippet: LeBron James knocked down an 18-foot jumper with 10.5 seconds left to lift the Heat over the Celtics and extend Miami’s winning streak, which is 10 shy of the N.B.A. record.
